translations: 允许；给予；认可（allow的第三人称单数）
容许；考虑（allow的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: He never allows work to encroach upon his family life.
sentences.translation: 他从不让工作扰乱他的家庭生活。

sentences.sentence: California no longer allows smoking areas in restaurants.
sentences.translation: 加利福尼亚州不再允许在饭店里设吸烟区。

sentences.sentence: The course allows students to progress at their own speed.
sentences.translation: 本课程允许学生按各自的速度学习。
